verses.roman:
tomāra hṛdaya āmi jāni patrī-dvāre
tomā śikhāite śloka pāṭhāila tomāre

synonyms: tomāra—your; hṛdaya—hearts; āmi—I; jāni—understand; patrī-dvāre—by those letters; tomā—you; śikhāite—to instruct; śloka—a verse; pāṭhāila—I sent; tomāre—unto you.
translation: "By your letters, I could understand your heart. Therefore, in order to teach you, I sent you one verse, which reads as follows.
